author: WSJ Staff
title: WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Optimistic Americans, Rising Bank Profits, Apple’s Secret Search
text: Americans report steady improvements in their financial well-being and more of them are optimistic about their future employment prospects, according to a recent Federal Reserve survey. But people’s perceptions of their economic situation varied by race and educational attainment. The report found persistent signs of economic fragility, with many workers continuing to struggle to save WSJ City: Japan Alarmed by US Car Tariff Threat, North Korea Says it Could Scratch Summit Next Unlikely Supporter Exxon, Pledges to Fight Climate Change—Energy Journal
